Articles.Content: I have not been able to play KSP2 since launch, First it was stuck on "Pumping Sim Once" and now its "Setting Universe State". I cant seem to find any threads that talk about this. HELP!!!!!

16 minutes ago, kspperson said:

I have not been able to play KSP2 since launch, First it was stuck on "Pumping Sim Once" and now its "Setting Universe State". I cant seem to find any threads that talk about this. HELP!!!!!

I might not have searched hard enough, but I do not have AppData for KSP2 so I cannot delete the folder as asked. Could this be the issue?
